name: KSLR
description:
This is an #epicmegajam2021 submission

KSLR is a game about what happens when billionaires are the only people who get to go to space, and the trash they leave behind.  Pilot your modified space garbage truck and blast away at their garbage until it's small enough to pick up.

All art, design, and programming by Kate Bui (@armyofmeat) except the items below:

Planetary textures by: www.solarsystemscope.com

Font is Audiowide by Astigmatic One Eye Typographic Institute via https://www.1001freefonts.com/
